column8: Wait for me, Mother. I'll be there soon.
I'm leaving. Try and stop me.
Thank you, Goddess. Your power fused with mine... this should be good.
Aha, yes, carry on, everyone, don't mind me...!
I'll keep that in mind, mate.
Nothing for me here. I should go.
Well, time to go get killed again.
Well, time to go get killed again.
Put your fate in the light!
Do, Re, Mi! Your end I see!
Better keep up with the rhythm!
Didn't I hear someone ask for an encore?
I'll never get tired of this sound.
La, Si, Do! Your pain will grow!
Is it because I called you Zagzag?
You were my cousin, Zagzag. I loved you.
This is what happens to those who succumb to the darkness.
Hear that? Silence shall be your only music.
I already knew this choice would be your last.
You want to start a band?
I knew you had it in you.
There's no one like you, Zagzag.
I'll write you a song for this!
Underworld, I want to hear you make some noise!
Let's get you out this time around!
We can go the distance together!
Lord Apollo, play me a song!
Lord Apollo, show me the path.
Lord Apollo, I agree with the terms.
This is too much, Lord Apollo.
I'm sure Lord Apollo won't mind.
Lord Apollo won't mind, will he?
That's much brighter! All thanks to you, Lord Apollo!
We will bring peace to this realm.
We are the Warmth and Compassion Brigade!
I was only kind to you...
There's no reason to fight like this.
I didn't it want to come to this. Forgive me.
Go back to your father. Find your true home.
I did this out of kindness. I know someday you'll understand.
Oh hoh, you are on fire, young one!
I appreciate your gesture, young one.
You are going to burn it to the ground, aren't you?
I see the fire in your eyes.
This will get you far, Zagreus.
One step at a time, young one.
You shall be reborn from your ashes.
This is a piece of home.
Bring warmth and compassion to this world.
For the Warmth and Compassion Brigade!
Lady Hestia, bring him to me.
I didn't mean to, Lady Hestia.
I am very sorry, Lady Hestia.
It isn't anything against you, Lady Hestia.
I don't know why I did that, Lady Hestia.
I'll allow it. Thanks for your kindness, Lady Hestia.
I'm sure Lady Hestia won't mind.
Lady Hestia won't mind, will she?
The warmth and kindness... Thanks, Lady Hestia!
Oh, that's warmer thanks to you, Lady Hestia.
Lady Hestia, you've always been kind to me.
Lady Hestia, I feel at home thanks to you.
Kind of you to show now, Lady Hestia....
For the Warmth and Compassion Brigade.
